segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside, grabbing cookies, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, eagerly reaching up for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on this clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of these children is remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried the stool is going to give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could send him tumbling, cookies and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely oblivious to their daring raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a chaotic scene unfolding right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
